text: Piper fimbriulatum is a species of plant in the family Piperaceae. It is found in Colombia, Costa Rica, and Panama. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Mitré, M. 1998. Piper fimbriulatum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
